com.kevalpatel2106.ci.greenbuild.base.view

Class BaseButton

  • ProgressButton
    • com.kevalpatel2106.ci.greenbuild.base.view.GBButton

  • public class BaseButton
extends ProgressButton

    Created by Keval Patel on 04/03/17. This base class is to extend the functionality of AppCompatButton. Use this class instead of android.widget.Button through out the application.

    See Also:
    android.widget.Button
